Body: For publishing/subscribing to a topic in AWS IoT through web/mobile app you have three choices, either defining the app as an IoT device or the app act some how a AWS user which means that you can define a user in IAM and use its credentials to publish/subscribe to a topic (Not recommended). The third one is using Temporary Security Credentials, more information about it can be found  [here](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_temp.html).
